pageContext.title: Humanities Intensive Learning + Training
pageContext.description_excerpt: Humanities Intensive Learning and Teaching (HILT) is an intensive digital humanities training institute: a slate of engaging courses taught by some of the best scholars and teachers in the digital humanities, plentiful opportunities to meet and network with colleagues, and access to all the cultural resources of the Washington, D.C., area.
pageContext.participants: Kirsten Keister, Michelle Pridmore, Trevor Muñoz
